content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. As a landlord, I want to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my apartment. Can you tell me what you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the monthly rental price.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am also responsible and dependable. I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the monthly rental price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As a responsible and dependable tenant, I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, as a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible rental price for my property. Can you provide me with a specific monthly rental price that you are willing to pay for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 800 Euros per month.

I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am also responsible and dependable. I am looking for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the monthly rental price?

I have also looked at other apartments in the area and I have found that this apartment is the best value for money. I am confident that I can make the payments on time and take good care of the property.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for providing me with your offer of 800 Euros per month for the 25 square meter apartment in Munich. As a landlord, I appreciate your willingness to be a responsible and dependable tenant. However, I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment and I believe that I can get a higher rental price than what you have offered. I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. Would you be open to discussing a higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
